attributes.action: stop goverment funding of religious schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These school create much of divide in todays world which we really do not need. Religion much like politics should not be forced upon a child. People do not label a child a "Labor kid" or a "Tory kid" so why do we call children Catholic kids or Mulims kids just because of the parents views. The concept of god is a concept that should be kept away from children until they are able to fully understand the implications.

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition here:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faithschools/
If you wish to resubmit, please remove the party political material.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
